instructions: Download the GoPro app from the Google Play Store. Open the store and search for " GoPro " to find the app. It's free, but it does offer in-app purchases. Once the app is downloaded and installed on your Android device, you'll need to pair your GoPro camera to your device. Press the Mode button on the GoPro to select the camera's Setup menu. Depending on the model of GoPro you have, you'll want to select either Pair or Connection to pair it through the GoPro app. On your Android device, open the GoPro app. Find your GoPro device on the app and tap it to pair the two together. You'll be prompted to enter the code that appears on your GoPro's screen.
